title: FS/1888 Buffords Trade Card "A Short Stop"
author: HD28Player

posts.post_title: FS/1888 Buffords Trade Card "A Short Stop"
posts.post_content:
***SOLD***  1888 Buffords Trade Card (H804-3): "A Short Stop."  There is a light crease and an indentation near the top.  Both are typical of this thin stock trade card.  Great color, and nice period art work from the 1880's.  Measures: 3 3/8" x 5 1/8".  Issued for The Great Atlantic Tea Company.  SOLD..... USPS w/ tracking, ships to US only.  PP preferred.

SOLD....THANKS!
